title: Status Effects
content: ed Stunned by a wild joke. Can't move or take Actions, Bonus Actions or Reactions until damaged. Momentum Increases movement by 1.5m (5 ft). Removed when Restrained, Incapacitated, Prone, or slowed down. Mud Difficult terrain - Character moves at half speed. Mystra's Benevolence Gale has Advantage to Concentration checks. Nauseated Vulnerable to Psychic and Acid damage until next Long Rest. Necromancy of Thay Gain Speak with Dead once per long rest. Newborn Gathering its bearings. Disadvantage o
